name: Planet eater (JoeSouthpaw)
description:
Theme: Growth

Use WASD to control the space toad - eat smaller planets to grow and eat bigger & bigger ones. Avoid larger planets, these will kill you!

Tiny planets are edible, but won't help you grow.

Black holes will attract all edible planets to you.

Programming & art by Joe_southpaw, sound effects from dustyroom's casual game sounds.
